Class LanguagesController

java.lang.Object
app.languages.LanguagesController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/languages") public class LanguagesController extends Object

  • Constructor Details

    • LanguagesController

      public LanguagesController(LanguagesService languagesService)
      Constructs a LanguagesController with the given LanguagesService. Initializes the list of field names from the Languages class.
      Parameters:
      languagesService - the service used to manage languages

  • Method Details

    • findAll

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Languages> findAll(@RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="20") int size, @RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="id") String sortParam, @RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="ASC") String sortDirection)
      Retrieves a paginated list of languages, sorted by the specified parameter.
      Parameters:
      page - the page number to retrieve (default is 0)
      size - the number of items per page (default is 20)
      sortParam - the field to sort by (default is "id")
      sortDirection - the direction of the sort ("ASC" or "DESC", default is "ASC")
      Returns:
      a paginated list of languages

    • getLanguage

      @GetMapping("/language") public ArrayList<Languages> getLanguage(@RequestParam Integer movieId)
      Retrieves the languages associated with a specific movie ID.
      Parameters:
      movieId - the ID of the movie
      Returns:
      a list of languages associated with the specified movie

    • getTop10Languages

      @GetMapping("/top10") public ArrayList<Languages> getTop10Languages()
      Retrieves the top 10 most popular languages.
      Returns:
      a list of the top 10 languages

    • getType

      @GetMapping("/find-type") public Optional<String> getType(@RequestParam Integer languageId)
      Retrieves the type of a language by its ID.
      Parameters:
      languageId - the ID of the language
      Returns:
      an optional containing the type of the language, or empty if not found
